title: Moroccan Chicken and Whole Grain Couscous
ingredients: 6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - chopped
method: Step 1: Prepare couscous according to package directions.

Step 2: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Cook and stir onion in hot oil until tender. Mix in bay leaves, cloves, cinnamon, turmeric, and cayenne pepper. Add chicken and cook until well browned. Pour in chicken broth, garbanzo beans, and tomatoes; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes.
Step 3: Mix carrots and zucchini into the pot. Season with salt. Continue cooking until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes. Serve stew over cooked couscous.
